textBeforeTable: Text in German and English.   See also "Immanuel Lutheran Church, Perryville Mo.," R 977.8694 I33, which inlcudes a history and transcription of some of the records.)   Immanuel Lutheran Church was founded by members of Peace Lutheran Church. Peace Lutheran Cemetery is still located on the Frankenberg, along Highway 61. Its original members were settlers from Bavaria. Immanuel Lutheran was founded as the city of Perryville expanded and settlers desired a church and school closer to home.
